segment.source: How to Manage Servers in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Servers in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Servers in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Servers in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Servers in the Server Management Console

segment.source: The Application Virtualization Server Management Console is your interface to manage the servers in the Application Virtualization Platform.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization Server Management Console is your interface to manage the servers in the Application Virtualization Platform.

segment.source: From it, you can add, configure, and control all the Application Virtualization Management Servers.
segment.target: From it, you can add, configure, and control all the Application Virtualization Management Servers.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: How to Create a Server Group
segment.target: How to Create a Server Group

segment.source: Provides a procedure for creating server groups, to help you more effectively manage your servers.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for creating server groups, to help you more effectively manage your servers.

segment.target: How to Remove a Server Group

segment.source: How to Add a Server
segment.target: How to Add a Server

segment.source: Provides a procedure for adding servers to a server group.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for adding servers to a server group.

segment.source: How to Remove a Server
segment.target: How to Remove a Server

segment.source: Provides a procedure for removing servers from a server group.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for removing servers from a server group.

segment.target: How to Change the Server Cache Size

segment.target: Provides a procedure for changing the server ports.
